edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class FacultyDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.FacultyDirectory

  • public class FacultyDirectory
extends java.lang.Object
    Class maintains a directory of Faculty records with unique IDs. To be used in conjunction with RegistrationManager.
    Author:
    Nick Garner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private LinkedList<Faculty> facultyDirectory
      List of Faculty in the directory
      private static java.lang.String HASH_ALGORITHM
      Hashing algorithm

    • Method Detail

      • newFacultyDirectory

        public void newFacultyDirectory()
        Creates a new faculty directory linked list

      • loadFacultyFromFile

        public void loadFacultyFromFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructs the faculty directory by reading in data from a given input file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file to load into the directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If file cannot be read.

      • addFaculty

        public boolean addFaculty(java.lang.String firstName,
                          java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          java.lang.String repeatPassword,
                          int maxCourses)
        Adds a new Faculty member to the faculty directory. Returns true if successfully added, false if the faculty member has a duplicate ID as another faculty already in the directory.
        Parameters:
        firstName - Faculty's first name
        lastName - Faculty's last name
        id - Faculty's Unity ID
        email - Faculty's email address
        password - Faculty's password
        repeatPassword - Faculty's repeat password
        maxCourses - Faculty's max courses
        Returns:
        True if added
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When password cannot be hashed or if the two passwords do not match.

      • removeFaculty

        public boolean removeFaculty(java.lang.String facultyId)
        Removes the faculty with the given ID from the directory. Returns true if removed, false if the faculty is not in the list.
        Parameters:
        facultyId - The ID of the faculty member to remove.
        Returns:
        True if removed, false if not in list.

      • getFacultyDirectory

        public java.lang.String[][] getFacultyDirectory()
        Returns a 2D string array with all Faculty in the directory and columns for first name, last name, and ID.
        Returns:
        2D string array with faculty's first name, last name, and ID.

      • saveFacultyDirectory

        public void saveFacultyDirectory(java.lang.String fileName)
        Saves all faculty in the directory to a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to save to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If file cannot be written to.

      • getFacultyById

        public Faculty getFacultyById(java.lang.String id)
        Searches the directory sequentially for the given ID and returns the matching record.
        Parameters:
        id - The Unity ID to search the directory for.
        Returns:
        Returns the Faculty object if a match is found, else returns null
